verbs.description: interknit (third-person singular simple present interknits, present participle interknitting, simple past and past participle interknitted)

entries.meaning: To knit together; to unite closely; to intertwine.
examples: Also that I might rear as fits my houseMy children, and, giving brothers to thy sons,Bind them in one, and having interknitMy family, live on in happy case.
